701453f-a.text:
Melville Street, south of Van Nest Avenue, showing the pedestrian bridge across the New York, New Haven and Hartford Railroad tracks.
The view is southward.
April 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
701453f-a.folder: Melville Street & Van Nest Avenue, Bronx, NY
701453f-a.original_title: Bronx: Melville Street - Van Nest Avenue
